name: Slow-cooked Turkey Stew
description: Last night's turkey is today's delicious dinner!
preparation: In a bowl, whisk butter with flour, 3 Onion Dip Mix, and Herb & Garlic Dip Mix. Slowly whisk in Nourish Broth, mixing well between additions to prevent lumps. Pour into a slow cooker.
Add turkey, carrots, celery, and peppers. Cover and cook on high for 3-4 hours, or low for 6-7 hours. Add peas and heat through for 15–20 minutes.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!
